feed.title: Track Awesome Gatling Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A collection of resources covering different aspects of Gatling load testing tool usage.

entry.title: Awesome Gatling Updates on Jun 11, 2025
entry.content:
Tutorials

  • Load testing ZeroMQ with a custom DSL for Gatling

Community / Video Tutorials

  • gatling on Stack Overflow

entry.title: Awesome Gatling Updates on Oct 06, 2024
entry.content:
Tools / Plugins

  • gatling-kafka-plugin (⭐11) - Plugin for support Kafka in Gatling.
  • gatling-amqp-plugin (⭐5) - Plugin for support performance testing with AMQP in Gatling (3.2.x).
  • gatling-jdbc-plugin (⭐6) - Simple Gatling plugin for JDBC support.
  • gatling-picatinny (⭐4) - Library with a bunch of useful functions that extend Gatling DSL.

Tools / Miscellaneous

  • gatling-template.g8 (⭐3) - A Giter8 template for Gatling performance test project.

entry.content:

  • Distributed load testing with Gatling and Kubernetes

Tools / Frameworks

Videos / Talks

entry.title: Awesome Gatling Updates on Jan 18, 2023
entry.content:
Tools / Sandbox

  • gatling-scaffold (⭐17) - Base for load test project using Gatling, InfluxDB and Grafana.
  • perfiz (⭐15) - A dockerised API performance test setup based on Gatling with Grafana dashboards and Prometheus monitoring.

entry.title: Awesome Gatling Updates on Jun 14, 2022
entry.content:
Related / Awesome Lists

  • Awesome Locust (⭐104) - Open-source scalable load testing framework written in Python.

Related / Other

  • How They Load Test (⭐124) - A curated collection of publicly available resources on how companies around the world perform load testing.
  • Load Testing Toolkit (⭐203) - Collection of open-source tools for debugging, benchmarking, load and stress testing your code or services.

entry.title: Awesome Gatling Updates on Oct 15, 2021
entry.content:
Tutorials

  • Creating a custom Gatling protocol for AWS Lambda

Distributed Testing

  • Distributed Gatling (⭐102) - Solution to run Gatling simulation tests in a distributed/cluster environment.

Tools / Plugins

  • gatling-build-plugin (⭐3) - An SBT plugin to share common settings across Gatling's projects' builds.

Tools / Reporting

  • gatling-report (⭐122) - Parse Gatling simulation.log files to output CSV stats or build HTML reports with Plotly charts.

entry.title: Awesome Gatling Updates on Oct 04, 2021
entry.content:
Tools / Frameworks

  • Karate Gatling - Re-use Karate API-tests as performance tests executed by Gatling.
  • Carrier - Continuous test execution platform with ability to perform load testing using customized JMeter and Gatling containers.

entry.content:

  • Gatling Tutorials for Beginners - Tutorial series by James Willett.

Related / Awesome Lists

  • Awesome k6 (⭐686) - Open-source, developer-centric performance monitoring and load testing solution.

entry.title: Awesome Gatling Updates on Apr 28, 2021
entry.content:
Tools / Plugins

  • gatling-gradle-plugin (⭐29) - Gatling plugin for Gradle.

Tools / Miscellaneous

  • gatling.g8 (⭐8) - Giter8 template for Gatling.

entry.title: Awesome Gatling Updates on Apr 21, 2021
entry.content:
Tools / Reporting

  • gatling2allure (⭐6) - Convert Gatling log to Allure report.

entry.title: Awesome Gatling Updates on Feb 03, 2021
entry.content:
Tools / Plugins

  • gatling-bolt (⭐2) - Support Neo4j Bolt protocol for Gatling.
  • gatling-zeromq (⭐5) - A Gatling stress test plugin for ZeroMQ protocol.
  • gatling-dubbo (⭐151) - A Gatling plugin for running load tests on Apache Dubbo.

Tools / Miscellaneous

  • dakiya (⭐37) - Convert Postman collections to Gatling scripts.

CI / Miscellaneous

  • Gatling Jenkins Plugin (⭐35) - Jenkins plugin for Gatling.

Community / Video Tutorials

  • @GatlingTool on Twitter

entry.title: Awesome Gatling Updates on Nov 02, 2020
entry.content:
Tools / Plugins

  • gatling-remote-sbt (⭐10) - Remote execution plugin for Gatling load tests.
  • gatling-junitrunner (⭐3) - JUnit wrapper around Gatling simulations.
  • gatling-mqtt (⭐43) - A Gatling plugin for stress testing MQTT.
  • gatling-kafka (⭐67) - A Gatling plugin for stress testing Apache Kafka protocol.
  • gatling-sql (⭐6) - Gatling extension for JDBC or Spark Thrift Server stress testing.
  • gatling-tcp-extensions (⭐23) - TCP extensions for Gatling.
  • gatling-thrift (⭐18) - Gatling third party plugin for Apache Thrift.

entry.title: Awesome Gatling Updates on Sep 28, 2020
entry.content:
Tools / Plugins

  • gatling-sbt-plugin (⭐107) - Gatling SBT plugin to integrate Gatling with SBT, allowing to use Gatling as a testing framework.

entry.title: Awesome Gatling Updates on Sep 25, 2020
entry.content:
Tools / Plugins

  • gatling-jwt - An extension to Gatling 2.0 to help make JWT-signed requests.

entry.title: Awesome Gatling Updates on Mar 05, 2020
entry.content:

  • Awesome JMeter (⭐749) - Open-source load testing and performance measurement tool, written in Java.
  • Awesome Tsung (⭐22) - Open-source multi-protocol distributed load testing tool, developed in Erlang.

entry.title: Awesome Gatling Updates on Jan 03, 2020
entry.content:
Official Resources

  • Homepage
  • Source code (⭐6.7k)

Getting Started

  • A first look at Gatling, a DSL based load test tool
  • Gatling: Take your performance tests to the next level

Tutorials

  • Load testing gRPC services with Gatling

Tools / Plugins

  • gatling-grpc (⭐127) - Gatling load test plugin for gRPC.
  • gatling-aws (⭐11) - Gatling custom protocol for AWS Lambda.
  • gatling-xmpp-protocol (⭐4) - XMPP protocol for stress test XMPP servers with Gatling.

Related / Awesome Lists

  • Awesome Testing (⭐2k) - A curated list of testing resources.
